Rule.Name: Ensure SQL Server Browser service is disabled unless required
Rule.NonCompliantComment: The 'SQL Server Browser Service' is not configured correctly, which may expose the server to unauthorized access.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Ensure the 'SQL Server Browser Service' is disabled unless explicitly required. Command: Open SQL Server Configuration Manager, navigate to SQL Server Services, and set 'SQL Server Browser' to 'Disabled'. If required, configure it to use secure communication (TCP/IP or Named Pipes).
